hero.title: Nina Moore
hero.subtitle: Initiatory journeys for visionary women breaking free from emotional patterns and creative blocks — ready to radically embrace their power

pillar1.title: You have spiritual gifts
pillar1.description: You're psychic, creative, visionary — and you know there's more waiting to come through you.

pillar2.title: You're at a threshold
pillar2.description: Saturn return, your 30s, a crossroads that demands you finally step into the woman you're becoming.

pillar3.title: You're ready to radically embrace your power
pillar3.description: Not the polished version. Not the safe version. The raw, unfiltered truth of who you are.

invitation.title: The Invitation
invitation.p1: Every journey is different — because every soul arrives with its own story, its own wounds, its own readiness.
invitation.p2: There is no script here, only attuned presence and deep listening.
invitation.p3: When you step into this space, you are not coming to "fix yourself."
invitation.p4: You are entering a sacred container for remembering your truth, clearing what no longer serves you, and opening to the self you have not yet dared to fully embody.

transformation.title: Now is the time for embodied transformation
transformation.subtitle: I am here to walk with you as you build your living temple.
transformation.description: My work bridges your inner awakening and your outer life — helping you integrate your experiences, activate your potential, and live aligned with who you truly are.
transformation.closing: It's a journey to find the way home to yourself.

transformation.title: Transformation
transformation.description: Healing old patterns, stepping into leadership, navigating life transitions, and creating the life you're meant to live.

opening.title: Opening
opening.description: Every session is a portal — an invitation to become more of who you are and step into your full expression and purpose.

integration.title: Integration
integration.description: Whether from psychedelics, spiritual experiences, or life breakthroughs — we ground insights into lasting change.

cta.title: 4 sessions + ongoing support

items.name: Gaby
items.outcome: Finding the Guide I Had Been Searching For
items.text1: You are the guide I have been praying for years to find. Nina's presence and wisdom helped me navigate one of the most transformative periods of my life with grace and clarity.
items.text2: Through our work together, I discovered parts of myself I had forgotten existed. Her ability to see through to the heart of things and hold space for deep transformation is truly a gift.

items.name: Sarah
items.text1: I came to Nina feeling completely stuck — creatively blocked and disconnected from my power. Within weeks, something shifted. I started creating again, trusting my vision, and finally stepping into who I knew I was meant to be.
items.text2: The transformation was real and lasting. Nina opened doors of awareness, revealing new spaces of courage, joy, and authentic expression. I'm now living as the woman I always knew I could become.

items.name: Maya
items.text1: Working with Nina through my Saturn return was the most profound investment in myself I've ever made. I've navigated major life transitions, healed wounds I didn't know I was carrying, and stepped into my power in ways I never thought possible.
items.text2: Her ability to see through to the truth while holding me with such compassion is unmatched. She helped me remember who I really am beneath all the conditioning.

items.title: Life Changes
items.description: Breakups, breakthroughs, loss, awakenings — times of transition that need grounded support

items.title: Psychedelic Integration
items.description: Medicine ceremonies, challenging trips, self-led journeys — grounding the experience into your life

items.title: Relationship Alchemy
items.description: Healing attachment patterns, calling in sacred partnership, deepening self-intimacy

items.title: Purpose and Path
items.description: Finding yourself, dream work, vision, discovering your essence and gifts

items.title: Trauma and Heartbreaks
items.description: Rewriting the story, finding meaning, releasing what's been held

items.title: Spiritual Quest
items.description: Connection to source, rituals, remembrance, soul and the sacred

items.title: Creative Flow
items.description: Bringing back the spark, finding joy, self expression and trust

notRightFor.title: This Work May Not Be Right For You If
items: You're looking for a quick fix or magic solution
You're in acute mental health crisis (I'll help you find appropriate support)
You want someone to tell you what to do rather than discover your own truth
You're not willing to practice between sessions—insight alone doesn't create change
You're seeking diagnosis or treatment for clinical conditions
notRightFor.closing: I'm here to guide, not to fix. The transformation comes from you.

expectations.title: What You Can Expect From Me

items.title: Honesty Over Comfort
items.description: I'll reflect what I see, even when it's uncomfortable. Growth requires truth.

items.title: Full Presence
items.description: When we're in session, you have my complete attention. No distractions, no scripts—just deep listening.

items.title: Your Pace
items.description: We move at the speed that's right for you. There's no rushing breakthrough. Your nervous system sets the pace.

items.title: No Guru Dynamic
items.description: I'm a guide, not a guru. You're the authority on your own life. My job is to help you access your own wisdom.

about.title: About me
bio: I am in service of the collective awakening and the expansion of consciousness.
I value the aliveness of emotions, embodied wisdom, and authentic pathways to freedom.
My field of expertise encompasses a wide array of methods and skills that I have nourished through years of practice and self-inquiry.
As a practitioner and human being, I meet people heart to heart and offer deep presence for growth, healing, and self-realization.
I believe that each individual carries a unique and invaluable gift into the world, waiting to be unraveled.
I am devoted to living in integrity with what wants to be expressed through each of us.

background.title: Background
background.text: I've been guiding this work for 8+ years.
background.languages: Sessions available in English, Spanish, and French.

items.question: Is this therapy?
items.answer: No, I'm not a licensed therapist. This is transformational coaching with somatic and energy work. If you're dealing with severe mental health issues, I'll help you find appropriate therapeutic support. This work complements therapy beautifully—many clients do both.

items.question: What if I'm skeptical about 'energy work'?
items.answer: Good. You don't need to believe anything. We work with what you can feel—breath, sensation, emotion in your body. Whether you call it "energy" or "nervous system regulation" doesn't matter. The experience speaks for itself. Skeptics often become the biggest advocates.

items.question: Do I need to have done psychedelics?
items.answer: Not at all. About half my clients have never touched plant medicine. The integration work applies to any breakthrough experience—spiritual awakening, major loss, relationship ending, creative breakthrough. If you have done medicine work, I provide specific integration support.

items.question: How is this different from traditional therapy?
items.answer: Traditional therapy often works primarily through talking and cognitive understanding. This work engages your body directly—breath, sensation, movement. We don't just talk about patterns, we work with the energy and emotion stored in your system. Many clients find things shift faster because we're working at multiple levels.

items.question: What happens if we're not a good fit?
items.answer: That's what the free discovery call is for. If I don't think I can help you, I'll tell you honestly and point you toward someone who can. You deserve to work with the right person for your journey. No pressure, no sales pitch.

items.question: What technology do I need?
items.answer: Just a computer or tablet with video capability (Zoom). A quiet, private space where you can speak freely. Headphones help with audio quality but aren't required. Most of my clients are remote and sessions work beautifully online.

cancellation.title: Cancellation
items: Discovery calls: Cancel anytime, no charge
Single sessions: 48-hour notice for full refund
Packages/programs: First session non-refundable, remaining sessions can be rescheduled within 6 months

confidentiality.title: Confidentiality
confidentiality.description: All sessions are completely confidential. What you share stays between us, except in cases where there's risk of harm to self or others.

rescheduling.title: Rescheduling
rescheduling.description: Life happens. You can reschedule sessions with 24-hour notice at no charge.

kundalini.title: Creative Unblocking
kundalini.subtitle: Reconnect with your creative source.
description: You used to create freely. Now something's blocking you—perfectionism, fear of judgment, disconnection from what inspired you.
This isn't about forcing productivity. We work with what's underneath the block—the energy, emotion, and patterns keeping you stuck.

whatWeWorkOn.title: What We Work On
items: Releasing perfectionism and fear of judgment
Reconnecting with your creative source
Processing blocks related to past experiences
Building sustainable creative practices
Embodying your authentic expression

structure.title: Structure
structure.description: 3-month container with 12 sessions (weekly or bi-weekly). Many clients complete projects they'd abandoned for years within the first month.

whoFor.title: Who This Is For
items: Artists, writers, entrepreneurs feeling blocked
Creative women in burnout
Women who've lost touch with their creative spark
Those ready to create from authentic expression vs. external validation

retreats.title: Private Retreats
retreats.subtitle: 2-5 day intensive immersions.
description: Sometimes breakthrough requires stepping completely away from daily life.
These private retreats offer uninterrupted space for deep work—no rushing back to responsibilities, no dividing your attention. Just you, the work, and the time your process needs.

whatsIncluded.title: What's Included
items: Multiple daily sessions (2-3 hours total per day)
Accommodation in beautiful, private setting
All meals (supporting your process)
Somatic practices, breathwork, nature immersion
Integration practices for when you return home
Post-retreat check-in session

formats.title: Format Options
items: Individual retreats (solo deep work)
Small groups (2-4 women you bring)

investment.title: Duration & Investment
items: 2-day weekend: €1,800
3-day midweek: €2,500
5-day immersion: €4,000

services.title: Individual Sessions

hero.title: Work With Me
hero.subtitle: Single sessions and packages for focused support

services.intro: Whether you're curious about working together, navigating a specific challenge, or need integration support after a transformative experience—these sessions offer focused, personalized attention.

discoveryCall.title: Discovery Call
discoveryCall.description: A conversation to see if we're a good fit. We'll discuss what you're seeking, how I work, and whether this approach feels right for you. No pressure, no sales pitch.
cover: How I work and what to expect
Whether we're a good fit for each other
Next steps if you want to move forward

singleSession.title: Single Session
singleSession.whoFor: You're going through a transition, processing a breakthrough (or breakdown), or need support integrating a recent experience.
singleSession.description: A deep-dive session for specific challenges, transitions, or integration needs.

whatWeDo.title: What We'll Do
items: Start with where you are right now—no judgment, full presence
Use breathwork and somatic practices to access what's stuck
Identify the pattern or block that's keeping you looping
Create a practice to continue the work on your own

singleSession.outcome: You'll leave with clarity on your next step, a sense of relief in your body, and practical tools to support yourself.
bestFor: Integration after psychedelics or plant medicine
Trying out our work before committing to ongoing sessions

integrationPackage.title: Integration Package
integrationPackage.whoFor: You've had a profound experience—plant medicine, awakening, breakdown, breakthrough—and need support integrating it into your life.
integrationPackage.description: Three 90-minute sessions spaced over 6 weeks to help you ground and integrate transformative experiences.

whatWeDo.title: What's Included
items: Pre-session preparation and intention setting
Three deep 90-minute integration sessions
Somatic practices tailored to your experience
Email support between sessions

integrationPackage.outcome: You'll feel grounded, clear, and able to bring the insights from your experience into daily life.
included: Somatic practices tailored to your experience

steps.title: Before We Meet
steps.description: After booking, you'll receive a brief intake form so I understand what you're seeking. This ensures we make the most of our time together.

steps.title: During Our Session
steps.description: Sessions happen via video call. We work with conversation, somatic practices, breathwork, and energy—tailored to what you need in the moment.

steps.title: After We Work Together
steps.description: You'll receive specific practices and integration support. If you want to continue working together, we'll explore what that looks like.

finalCta.title: Not sure where to start?
finalCta.subtitle: Book a free discovery call. We'll figure it out together.
